DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine oral intake dietary supplement SAMe increase blood homocysteine level healthy human subject .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Dietary Supplement SAMe Blood Homocysteine Levels
DOC.detailed_description: S-adenosyl-L-methionine ( SAMe AdoMet ) commonly use nutritional supplement available United States since 1999 . SAMe metabolize homocysteine , know cardiovascular risk factor . No study determine effect exogenous SAMe administration long-term level homocysteine human . As nutritional supplement , SAMe regulate Food Drug Administration , despite use treat clinical disease depression osteoarthritis .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Women men age 18 65 Able understand sign consent form Exclusion criterion : Smoking Pregnant lactate Women actively try conceive Diagnosis panic disorder bipolar disorder
